background: Complete Infrastructure as Code (IaC) QA pipeline implementation for Terraform-based AWS VPC infrastructure. This project demonstrates comprehensive testing strategies including 146 unit tests and 47 integration tests that gracefully handle both deployed and non-deployed infrastructure scenarios. The implementation covers VPC, subnets, NAT gateways, EC2 instances, security groups, and route tables with full AWS SDK integration for real resource validation. Features multi-environment support (dev, staging, prod), proper resource tagging, security best practices, and production-ready configurations with cost optimization considerations.
author: koushik-turing
